job_details.Functieomschrijving:
In this role, as part of the R&D team, you will work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development. Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop data driven software. As an AI engineer your responsibilities will include building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models. Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem., * Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
     * Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
     * Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
     * Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users. You work in the R&D department, but you will work together with other teams on a regular basis.
job_details.full_text:
AI Engineer, R&D

In this role, as part of the R&D team, you will work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development. Your core role will be to research, prototype and develop data driven software. As an AI engineer your responsibilities will include building AI driven solutions with both external and internal models. Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem., * Research, Design, Prototype, Experiment, and build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience.
     * Research, prototype and build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's.
     * Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions and rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations.
     * Work with other engineers across the company to continuously consider how to implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users. You work in the R&D department, but you will work together with other teams on a regular basis.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building AI-driven solutions with both external and internal models, including research, prototyping, and development of data-driven software. It specifically mentions 'Vector databases to LLMs' and the need to 'build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience,' aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on developing and deploying generative AI applications. The role also involves innovation, rapid prototyping, and working with other engineers to implement ideas in large-scale applications, further supporting this classification.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'work closely with stakeholders in understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development' directly indicates understanding business needs and translating them into technical requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: understanding what the business needs and translate that into technical requirements for research and development

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's' points to the development and utilization of AI/ML models, specifically mentioning LLMs and vector databases which are core to generative AI modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: build AI/ML driven systems that understand video and that use the latest innovation. From Vector databases to LLM's

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'research, prototype and develop data driven software' implies the creation and experimentation with data-driven models and software.
job_tasks.phrase: research, prototype and develop data driven software

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience' indicates the development of user-facing software and systems.
job_tasks.phrase: build services, tools, systems, features and experiences that help fuel a great streaming experience

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations' describes a software development process focused on quick development cycles.
job_tasks.phrase: rapidly prototyping potential solutions in short iterations

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users' suggests the need for productionizing and scaling developed solutions, which falls under operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: implement ideas and prototypes in large-scale applications serving millions of users

soft_skills.phrase: Pushing the boundaries of what is possible in the rapidly moving AI ecosystem.
Be the spear point of innovation coming up with smart ideas and solutions
Work with other engineers across the company
